reviewtext: Definately has the best color screen.Performance is fast and I like the new interface and programs, especially MS reader.  You can read ebooks and listen to audiobooks from audio.com, both from within MS Reader.My only  complaint is that the device seems to slow down after opening more than 4  or 5 programs.  Also, I have needed to "reboot" the machine more  than with my E-11, but it has not been troublesome for me.Overall, great  product and great performance.
